message: Let me start it off with a classic - cannabalt
I found canabalt very boring but it's sister app Gravity Bolt very addictive
Canabalt, Gravity Hook, Tiny Wings, Flight Control & Astronaut all get the most play for me recently
Strategery and Zen Bound are also pretty awesome
There are lots of games that I consider "good" that just aren't addictive enough to keep me playing
My favorite game is Street Fighter IV. It's hard to believe how well it plays, fighting games shouldn't work on a touch screen, but they pulled it off.
tiny wings is incredible, the bar shuffleboard game is fun and challenging, monster dash rules
i will say, though, that i recently dusted off my gameboy advance and metroid zero mission, and nothing on the iphone even comes close

@takeo I found my old Gameboy Color the other day and had a blast on Tetris. Then I forgot it was in my bag and tried to take it through Delhi airport. Its the kind with a translucent cover with visible circuitry and they didn't like it AT ALL.
MegaJump is pretty cool. It never gets old
@anildigital yep! Calcutta first, then a few days in Delhi
My favourite iPhone game is Tilt to Live. I think I've spent more time playing it than the rest of the games on my phone combined.
My favorite games are gun bros , trenches , pocket warfare , siege war , and Angry birds
